list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: How long did the suspect maintain his silence?
He maintains his car very well.
How can you maintain a wife and three children on your small salary?

list_definition.definition: to continue to argue or believe (that)

list_ex_of_definition.ex_of_definition: I maintain that the theory is true.

list_ex_of_english: Driving and maintaining a car may be essential and this may become an expense that an older person might wish they could do without.
Under threat, the organization of the self-schema will be maintained while the traumatic or unexpected information is processed.
An invariant is a predicate on the state space that is maintained by all operations.
The beam profile was maintained up to the maximum average pulse power, as the amplified beam was well phase conjugated.
Individuals who maintained stronger ties with the traditional past would be less likely to leave written accounts.
Stationary nongyrotropy may be maintained by sources and sinks in velocity space.
The assumption of fixed granularity is called into question by the widespread practice of maintaining confidentiality of source code.
In most cases structural unity is maintained by the internal recurrences of specific patterns.
